experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Collaborated cross-functionally with data, product, and engineering teams to gather and consolidate campaign data from diverse sources and automated the daily reports leading to a 15-hour weekly reduction in manual work.• Extracted actionable insights from the generated reports, leveraging in-depth analysis by collaborating with relevant stakeholders to strategically enhance operations, achieving a 5% conversion rate growth

positions.subtitle: Cognizer Inc
positions.description: • Built a management console that logs the usage of different APIs offered, gathered requirements from the business team, the entire project involved collaborating with 10 cross-functional stakeholders.• Led acceptance testing process for a major client by managing a team of 3 QAs, increased the accuracy from 60% to 99%.• Designed a sidebar for GitHub that presents productivity metrics for developers which helps engineering teams increase productivity by 20%; collaborated with 6 stakeholders from marketing, design and engineering team.• Analysed different OCR applications and reported the one to the stakeholders that increased the efficiency by 15%.
positions.title: Product Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Built a management console that logs the usage of different APIs offered, gathered requirements from the business team, the entire project involved collaborating with 10 cross-functional stakeholders.
• Led acceptance testing process for a major client by managing a team of 3 QAs, increased the accuracy from 60% to 99%.
• Designed a sidebar for GitHub that presents productivity metrics for developers which helps engineering teams increase productivity by 20%; collaborated with 6 stakeholders from marketing, design and engineering team.
• Analysed different OCR applications and reported the one to the stakeholders that increased the efficiency by 15%.
